title: FT: T206 Tougher Backs w/ HOF
author: DerekMichael

posts.post_title: FT: T206 Tougher Backs w/ HOF
posts.post_content:
Hello. In the spirit of all the wild offseason activity in baseball right now (if the Mets do not get a power bat soon, I am going to lose my mind), I would like to post a trade proposal on net 54, because lets face it ... this is where the action is!

I have a batch of seven T206 cards, including some HOF with a few of the more exotic backs in the set. What I would like to do is to "trade up" for a big power slugger (Broad Leaf, Carolina, perhaps? :) ...) to someone who is looking to "trade down" for a batch of veterans and a few prospects. You get can get the following 7 cards in the trade:

1.) Fred Clarke (HOF) "Holding Bat": Brown Hindu ... SGC A (there is a trim on the bottom [not done by me!], but it is actually kind of a nice looking card in my opinion ... gotta love the sleeves!)

2.) John McGraw (HOF) "Portrait-No Cap": Brown Hindu ... SGC 1 (a decent looking front with "Fredrick Benedict Gessner" stamped on the back, and "Princeton" written in a calligraphy style writing also on the back ... kind of an interesting one, and the second Brown Hindu I have seen with this mans name stamped on the back ... does anyone know who this guy was?).

3.) Miller Huggins (HOF) "Hands At Mouth": American Beauty 350 {Frame} ... PSA 3

4.) Miller Huggins (HOF) "Hands At Mouth": Tolstoi ... PSA 3

5.) Sam Crawford (HOF) "With Bat": American Beauty 350 {No Frame} ... SGC 3

6.) Addie Joss (HOF) "Pitching": El Principe De Gales ... SGC 1

7.) Nap Rucker "Portrait": El Principe De Gales ... PSA 3



If you have any interest in acquiring this group, feel free to shoot me a PM, and I will respond to you with details on scans.

My interests are the tougher backs like Carolina Brights, Broad Leaf, Lenox, Red Hindu 

Thanks guys.

Derek

PS

I forgot to say that I have a T3 Turkey Red Joe Tinker that is actually kind of nice. It is in an SGC A holder because I think it may have been given a trim on the bottom at one point (not by me). IF you happen to like T3's, you can add the card to the deal.

Thanks.

Derek
about 1 of the cards   Bill Latzko

Hi Derek,

I have a dupe Red Hindu HOFer (SGC 10).  Shoot me an email if you'd like to chat about a trade.

Best,
[url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]
